chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
this: Equality.sort nat_eqType

Goal:
this == cn -> this \notin pts

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Notation seq := list
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
Module Equality := Struct Definition block : forall A : Type, A -> A. Parameter JMeq_eq_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), JMeq_eq JMeq_refl = erefl x. Parameter UIP_refl_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), UIP_refl A x (erefl x) = erefl (erefl x). Parameter inj_pairT2_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (P : A -> Type) (p : P x), inj_pairT2 A P x p p (erefl (existT P x p)) = erefl p. Record DependentEliminationPackage (A : Type) : Type := Build_DependentEliminationPackage { elim_type : Type; elim : elim_type } Definition elim_type : forall A : Type, DependentEliminationPackage A -> Type. Definition elim : forall (A : Type)
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
vrefl_rect : forall x : ?T, ?P x -> x = x where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts this : nat_eqType |- Type] ?P : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts this : nat_eqType |- pred ?T]
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
SubType : forall (sub_sort : Type) (val : sub_sort -> ?T) (Sub : forall x : ?T, ?P x -> sub_sort), (forall K : sub_sort -> Type, (forall (x : ?T) (Px : ?P x), K (Sub x Px)) -> forall u : sub_sort, K u) -> (forall (x : ?T) (Px : ?P x), val (Sub x Px) = x) -> subType ?P where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts this : nat_eqType |- Type] ?P : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts this : nat_eqType |- pred ?T]
this_not_pts : forall this : nat_eqType, this \in pts -> (this == cn) = false
Record tuple_of (n : nat) (T : Type) : Type := Tuple { tval : seq T; _ : is_true (size tval == n) } Arguments tuple.tuple_of _%nat_scope _%type_scope Arguments tuple.Tuple [n]%nat_scope [T]%type_scope [tval]%seq_scope
Heap.upd_nullP : forall (f : {finMap ptr -> dynamic id}) (x : ptr) (v : dynamic id), x != null -> null \notin supp f -> null \notin supp (ins x v f)
localCoh = fun n : nid => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom h)] : nid -> Pred heap
addn0 = fun n : nat => [eta eqP] ((fun _evar_0_ : (fun n0 : nat => is_true (n0 + 0 == n0)) 0 => (nat_ind (fun n0 : nat => n0 + 0 == n0) _evar_0_)^~ n) (eqxx 0) (fun n0 : nat => id)) : right_id 0 addn
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
Inductive heap : Type := Undef : heap | Def : forall finmap : {finMap ptr -> dynamic id}, null \notin supp finmap -> heap Arguments Heap.Def [finmap]
trans_updDom : forall (this : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (s : heap), this \in nodes -> TPCCoh d -> dom (upd this s (dstate d)) =i nodes
dom_fresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), fresh f \notin dom f
cohMsg = fun (ms : msg TaggedMessage) (y : nat) => if from ms == cn then to ms \in pts /\ msgFromCoordinator (content ms) y else if from ms \in pts then to ms == cn /\ msgFromParticipant (content ms) y else True : msg TaggedMessage -> nat -> Prop Arguments cohMsg _ _%nat_scope
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
step_is_local : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_step w this s1 s2 -> forall z : nat_eqType, z != this -> find z (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) = find z (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
Actions.a_safe : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid), Actions.action W V this -> state -> Prop
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
stepV1 : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> valid s1
Idle : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
tuple.Tuple : forall (n : nat) (T : Type) (tval : seq T), size tval == n -> tuple.tuple_of n T
msgFromCoordinator = fun (tms : TaggedMessage) (y : nat) => if tag tms == prep_req then exists data : seq nat, tms = y :: data else if tag tms == commit_req then tms = [:: y] else if tag tms == abort_req then tms = [:: y] else False : TaggedMessage -> nat -> Prop Arguments msgFromCoordinator _ _%nat_scope
Actions.step_sem : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Actions.step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
a_step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
UbnEq : forall m n : nat_eqType, m == n -> ubn_eq_spec m n
tuple.tuple_subType : forall (n : nat) (T : Type), subType (fun x : seq T => size x == n)

```coq
intro this_eq_cn.
rewrite this_eq_cn in Hnin.
apply is_true_false in Hnin.
contradiction.
Qed.```

original: intro this_eq_cn. rewrite this_eq_cn in Hnin. apply is_true_false in Hnin. contradiction.
